text: Elsebeth Gerner Nielsen (born 5 January 1960) is a Danish politician. She is a member of the Social Liberal Party. She served as Minister for Culture from 1998 to 2001. She was also an MP from 1994 to 2007. She was born in Åsted Sogn, Frederikshavn. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Nielsen tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Danish politicians
title: Elsebeth Gerner Nielsen
